SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price_excl, (p.stock <= 0) AS out_of_stock,
f.user_id IS NOT NULL
FALSE
AS is_fav FROM vw_product_core p
LEFT JOIN favorite f ON f.product_id = p.product_id AND f.user_id = #{userId}
WHERE p.status = '1'
AND (
p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{kw}, '%')
)
ORDER BY
p.created_at DESC
p.price_excl DESC
p.price_excl ASC
, p.product_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE status = '1'
AND (
product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{kw}, '%')
)

select p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_description, p.price_excl, (p.stock <= 0) AS out_of_stock, coalesce(rs.avg, 0) as rating_avg, coalesce(rs.cnt, 0) as review_count,
f.user_id IS NOT NULL
FALSE
as is_fav from vw_product_core p left join ( select r.product_id, round(avg(r.rating), 1) as avg, count(*) as cnt from review r group by r.product_id ) rs on rs.product_id = p.product_id
left join favorite f on f.product_id = p.product_id and f.user_id = #{userId}
where p.product_id = #{productId} and status = '1'
